title: The Good Shepherd
description: Jesus teaches about being the Good Shepherd who protects His sheep.

scenes.title: The Shepherd's Voice
scenes.content: Jesus said, 'My sheep hear my voice, and I know them, and they follow me.'

scenes.title: Safe in His Care
scenes.content: The Good Shepherd protects His sheep from danger and leads them to green pastures.

title: David and Goliath
description: Young David trusts God to help him defeat the giant Goliath.

scenes.title: The Giant's Challenge
scenes.content: Goliath challenged the Israelite army, but they were all afraid except young David.

scenes.title: David's Faith
scenes.content: David said, 'The Lord will deliver me from this giant!' and he trusted God completely.

scenes.title: Victory Through Faith
scenes.content: With just a stone and sling, David defeated Goliath because God was with him.
